body: Well I today I was paying with Steven and other great people from this server and I notice every time I speak in Team Speak I sound so wired does this happen to any of you guys?
body_tagged: Well I today I was paying with Steven and other great people from this server and I notice every time I speak in Team Speak I sound so wired does this happen to any of you guys?
title: Do any of sound wired on Teamspeak

replies.body:
1. one of dem people wuz meh
2. what you mean wired? you sounded fine with a giant sexy voice ;)
replies.body_tagged:
1. one of dem people wuz meh
2. what you mean wired? you sounded fine with a giant sexy voice ;)

replies.body: you mean weird not wired and your voice is different that how you hear it because you hear it so close to yourself+the vibrations your voice makes.
replies.body_tagged: you mean weird not wired and your voice is different that how you hear it because you hear it so close to yourself+the vibrations your voice makes.

replies.body: My computer's mic makes my voice much higher than  it actually is (not high). So yeah...
replies.body_tagged: My computer's mic makes my voice much higher than  it actually is (not high). So yeah...

replies.body:
I had to take speech lessons when I was a kid. I have a speech inability... and it sucks... it's embarrassing.

If it wasn't for that, I would be perfectly fine with my voice. If you haven't heard it yet, go check out Steven's latest video. :$

Edit: video got taken down so deal with it lads xPPPPPPPP
replies.body_tagged:
I had to take speech lessons when I was a kid. I have a speech inability... and it sucks... it's embarrassing.

Edit: video got taken down so deal with it lads xPPPPPPPP

replies.body:
I think I sound much different than I actually do. When I hear my voice in videos I can't believe that's how I sound and I immediately become uncomftorable with my voice :c

I used to have a really bad stutter when I was young. If you frequent on TeamSpeak, I'm sure you've heard me begin talking and then freeze up and mumble. That's my biggest problem and I've been working against it for a long time. Although it's much better now than it was, it's still a problem. So, now you'll know why :P

replies.body: The way people think they sound when they talk can be very different when you actually listen to it. Don't worry about how your voice sounds, its just the self-conscious felling. And to get back on topic it could just be your mic.
replies.body_tagged: The way people think they sound when they talk can be very different when you actually listen to it. Don't worry about how your voice sounds, its just the self-conscious felling. And to get back on topic it could just be your mic.

replies.body: Yes. Technology changes my voice when recorded into a higher Pitch.
replies.body_tagged: Yes. Technology changes my voice when recorded into a higher Pitch.
